fields.name: agent
fields.title: Agent
fields.description: The direct performer or driver of the action

fields.name: startTime
fields.title: Start Time
fields.description: When the Action was performed: start time. This is for actions that span a period of time.

fields.name: endTime
fields.title: End Time
fields.description: The endTime of something. This is for actions that span a period of time.

fields.name: actionStatus
fields.title: Action Status
fields.description: Indicates the current disposition of the Action.

fields.name: object
fields.title: Object
fields.description: The object upon the action is carried out, whose state is kept intact or changed.

fields.name: location
fields.title: Location
fields.description: The location of the event, organization or action.

fields.name: participants
fields.title: Participants
fields.description: Other co-agents that participated in the action indirectly.

fields.name: result
fields.title: Result
fields.description: The result produced in the action.
